channel.title: Exion master
channel.description: can anyone tell me how to get master on exion's source, i've looked everywhere and still can't do master.

item.title: Exion master
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Butchd12:

There is the ::master…but if that doesnt work…train…lol…but if your lazy…change them in your character file…this is seriously common sense dude…

Your a fool, never try to help someone again.

tann:

lol im sorry, serioursly first time ever even doing a private server.

Don’t listen to him, he has no idea what he is talking about.

@OP: Use the for-loop, make a master command and put this in it, you would have to convert it to Project Insanity though.

for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++); addSkillXP(14000000, i);

In case you don’t understand, I will explain this because it’s useful.

“for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++);”

The integer i is now equal to 0.

“for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++);”

If the integer i is below 21 (Which it is, because is the last step, it was equal to 0)

“for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++);”

It will add 1 to the integer i, basically, until the integer i reaches 21, because I the last step, it checks if the integer is below 21.

“addSkillXP(14000000, i);”

Now, it will add 14, 000, 000 XP, to all the skills from 0-21.

Read full topic
